ckl-auto-heal-targets.no-gm-warning: Auto healing requires GM to be logged in.

debug.name: Debug
debug.hint: Enable to see extra debug info in the console (off by default).

heal-all.name: Heal All Targets
heal-all.hint: Enable to heal all targets (default). Disable to heal only targets with the same disposition as you.

show-healing-hint.name: Show Healing Hint
show-healing-hint.hint: Add a hint to the bottom of chat chat cards when healing happens (default true).
